T02D2271:115b-1: tsitta ko sha aa badzra g'i ti /
T02D2271:115b-3: thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu /
T02D2271:115b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2271:115b-5: skye bo lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni //
T02D2271:115b-6: rang gi nyams su myong ba de kho na //
T02D2271:115b-7: rig dang ma rig rang rig gsal ba de kho na //
T02D2271:115b-8: mar me mun gsal rang gi rang gsal rang la sad //
T02D2271:115b-9: 'dam gyi padma 'dam la ma zhen kha dog legs //
T02D2271:115b-10: gzung 'dzin dri ma ma spangs snying po gsal //
T02D2271:115b-11: nags khrod gnas pa'i ri dags gcig pur rgyu //
T02D2271:115b-12: rgyu la ma zhen 'bras bu de kho na //
T02D2271:115b-13: snang dang mi snang yul med zhen med gsal //
T02D2271:115b-14: dngos stong ma dran dran med brjed ba med //
T02D2271:115b-15: lhan cig skyes pa rnam gsum nyams su bde //
T02D2271:115b-16: zhen pa med phyir rtog ge'i yul las 'das //
T02D2271:115b-17: sna tshogs dran phyir rjes su 'brang ba med //
T02D2271:115b-18: gsal dang mi mnyam ye shes snying po nyid //
T02D2271:116a-0: mun sel nyi ma sgron me'i kha dog @116a * //
T02D2271:116a-2: rang rig rang la 'bar na 'dzin rtog zad //
T02D2271:116a-3: sgrib pa zad phyir dran med yengs pa med //
T02D2271:116a-4: gnyis dang yod med tha snyad ma skyed cig / phyag rgya chen po bsam med blo las 'das //
T02D2271:116a-5: rang rig rdo rje 'dzin pa rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2271:116a-6: 'da' dka' lhan cig skyes pa'i mar me ni //
T02D2271:116a-7: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i don //
T02D2271:116a-8: skye med stong pa 'od gsal ris dang bral //
T02D2271:116a-9: khyad par can gyi ye shes kho na nyid //
T02D2271:116a-10: gnyis la mi ltos bde ba rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D2271:116a-11: rang 'byung rtog med bag chags rtsad nas gcod //
T02D2271:116a-12: sems can sangs rgyas khyad par bsam yas kyang //
T02D2271:116a-13: spyod lam dag na rgyun gyi rnal 'byor che //
T02D2271:116a-14: dran pa'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab kyang //
T02D2271:116a-15: gdod nas dag pas dran med dbyings la thim //
T02D2271:116a-16: rang don skye med gnyis bral rtogs pa'i don //
T02D2271:116a-17: 'bras bu dag pas blo 'das yul med bral ;
T02D2271:116a-18: / rtogs pa'i thabs rgyun rang bzhin kun la khyab //
T02D2271:116a-19: thabs kyi 'gro don snying rje bsam yas kyang //
T02D2271:116a-20: ye shes rang bzhin skye 'gag med par rtogs //
T02D2271:116a-21: thabs kyi bde ba skyes kyang de med ma zin 'ching //
T02D2271:116a-22: grol ba'i ye shes rang la lhan cig 'byung //
T02D2271:116a-23: bsgom bya sgom byed dmigs pa'i blo las 'das //
T02D2271:116a-24: sangs rgyas sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
T02D2271:116a-25: skye med rtogs pa'i yul na blor mi snang //
T02D2271:116a-26: de nyid sad pas bde ba stong pas mtshon //
T02D2271:116a-27: bsgom bya'i ngo bo snang ba'i rkyen las byung //
T02D2271:116a-28: mi rtog rtogs pas kun rdzob tha snyad 'grub //
T02D2271:116a-29: gnyis su med pa'i snang ba rkyen med la //
T02D2271:116a-30: rang bzhin dag pa skye ba'i rnam 'phrul shar //
T02D2271:116a-31: bral dang ma bral mi rtog blo las 'das //
T02D2271:116a-32: gnyis med rtogs byar skye med yul du 'gyur //
T02D2271:116a-33: stong par smra bas de nyid rtogs mi 'gyur //
T02D2271:116a-34: blo las 'das pas mno bsam yul ma yin//
T02D2271:116a-35: mtha' gsum rtag 'dod dag gis rnyed par dga' //
T02D2271:116a-36: dga' bzhi dag la dmigs kyang de nyid dka' //
T02D2271:116a-37: tshogs drug rang chas ye shes mchog ldan pas //
T02D2271:116a-38: gnyis med bcud kyi snang ba rang la 'chad //
T02D2271:116a-39: kye ho phyag rgya chen po rtogs bral kun gyi gzhi //
T02D2271:116b-0: dngos grub 'byung @116b bas ngo mtshar rmad du che //
T02D2271:116b-1: gnyis med bag chags sad nas rang rig bral //
T02D2271:116b-2: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
T02D2271:116b-3: mtshan nyid bstan pas nyan thos la sogs skrag / rtse gcig bltas na yon tan mthar thug ldan //
T02D2271:116b-4: rtse gcig byas kyang cung zad bsgom du med//
T02D2271:116b-5: rnam rtog rang 'bar dran med gsos su zhi //
T02D2271:116b-6: dran med snang med me long gzugs brnyan 'dra //
T02D2271:116b-7: tha snyad bral bas skye med blo 'das lam //
T02D2271:116b-8: mtshan ma'i dran pa dri med bag chags bstan //
T02D2271:116b-9: thog mtha' bral zhing snga phyi'i dus mi dmigs //
T02D2271:116b-10: kye ho de phyir dngos med ye shes rtogs pa'i lam //
T02D2271:116b-11: ji ltar bag chags bral ba'i tshul zhe na //
T02D2271:116b-12: gnyis su ma gzung gdod mtha' bral bas zhi //
T02D2271:116b-13: bag chags bral bas phyogs med rgyu ba stong //
T02D2271:116b-14: zung du 'jug pa sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid //
T02D2271:116b-15: shes rab rnam gsum yul dang thabs su gsungs //
T02D2271:116b-16: dpe dang bral bas mtshon ba'i yul las 'das //
T02D2271:116b-17: skye ba 'di la dam pa'i snying po min //
T02D2271:116b-18: thabs kyi sbyor bas tshogs drug rang sar zhi //
T02D2271:116b-19: phung po lnga sogs yon tan dag pa'i zhing //
T02D2271:116b-20: kun mkhyen gnyis med snang yul zhen dang bral //
T02D2271:116b-21: don dam smra med kun rdzob rtog ge tsam//
T02D2271:116b-22: mya ngan 'das lam 'khor ba'i snang ba nyid //
T02D2271:116b-23: bla ma dam pa'i dgongs pa thug phrad du //
T02D2271:116b-24: rnyed nas 'khor ba'i lam las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2271:116b-25: rnal 'byor dgongs pa'i nyams rnyed rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2271:116b-26: ma nor lam du lhan cig kho na yin //
T02D2271:116b-27: kye ho gnyis med don du gsang sngags brda yis bkrol //
T02D2271:116b-28: yon tan mi zad rgya mtsho nor bu mtshungs //
T02D2271:116b-29: thabs mchog zin na bcu bzhi'i sa la gnas //
T02D2271:116b-30: gang du gnas kyang ye shes rang las rnyed //
T02D2271:116b-31: gter rnyed bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don la rmongs //
T02D2271:116b-32: snying gi ga'u padma'i me tog dkyil //
T02D2271:116b-33: thabs dang ldan pa sbyor ba de nas 'gyed //
T02D2271:116b-34: 'khor lo'i phyogs kyi rtsa gnas gang du yang //
T02D2271:116b-35: 'dod dang bral bas chags med nam mkha' la //
T02D2271:116b-36: gyen thur 'dren dang 'khor lo bskor ba yang //
T02D2271:116b-37: thabs kyi 'dren tshul don gyi gting mi rnyed //
T02D2271:117a-2: blun po dbugs mi bde dang khyad med mtshungs //
T02D2271:117a-3: rtogs par 'dod pas de nyid rtag tu blta //
T02D2271:117a-4: gus dang bas bla ma dkon mchog brten //
T02D2271:117a-5: gsang ba'i yon tan bla ma mchog las 'byung //
T02D2271:117a-6: don ldan mtshan nyid nyon mongs g-yul las rgyal //
T02D2271:117a-7: gsang ba'i don nyid don dang rab ldan pa'i //
T02D2271:117a-8: bla ma slob dpon lung dang rab ldan nas //
T02D2271:117a-9: mi gnyis sgo nas 'gro ba grol 'gyur shog /
T02D2271:117a-10: thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu snying po
